sentence: Mr. CORREA. Mr. Speaker, I was necessarily absent and missed the  following votes on the House Floor. Had I been present, I would have  voted accordingly: NO on Roll Call No. 164, Motion on Ordering the  Previous Question on H. Res. 499; and NO on Roll Call No. 165, H. Res.  499.
